DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to monitor the effectiveness and used dosage of the 8% capsaicin patch in real-life clinical practice in the treatment of post-operative neuropathic pain.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Efficacy and Safety of Qutenza in Patients With Post-operative Peripheral Neuropathic Pain
DOC.criteria: diagnosed peripheral postoperative neuropathic pain hypersensitivity to capsaicin pregnancy diabetes mellitus treatment of face
